projects.title: Link Share
projects.shortDescription: Secure file-sharing platform with expiring links
projects.description: A full-stack secure file-sharing platform with expiring links, encrypted uploads, and user authentication. Designed and tested fully within Termux and GitHub Codespaces, Link Share combines a clean frontend with a modular Express backend to provide a reliable self-hosted sharing experience.

projects.title: Marketplace V1.10
projects.shortDescription: Modern marketplace application with product listings
projects.description: A modern marketplace application built to support product listings, order flows, and seller management. Developed from scratch using Node.js and React, this version focused on better modular routing, product storage logic, and mobile-friendly UI testing within GitHub Codespaces and Termux.

projects.title: QuickBill Desk
projects.shortDescription: Lightweight billing and invoicing desktop app
projects.description: A lightweight billing and invoicing desktop app made for offline use. Designed to run easily in low-resource environments, QuickBill Desk allows quick invoice generation, customer tracking, and export features — reflecting the move from backend systems to full user-facing applications.

projects.title: Secure File Server V2.2.0
projects.description: A stable, production-tested Node.js server built to securely handle file uploads and downloads. This project refined your earlier architectures into a clean, modular backend — complete with authentication, audit logging, and configuration scripts — all built and tested on Android through Termux and Codespaces.
